node.name: Code Generator
node.shortdescription:
This plug-in can generate Java source classes and other code fragemnts based on an input file that is parsed (XML-Data model, create script, xhtml form, php ...) or direct via a database connection (Oracle, MySQL, SQL Server, ...).
For further details visit our website with JavaDoc, development statistics and various tutorials for the use of the plug-in as well as some hints for developers.
node.body:
This plug-in can generate Java source classes and other code fragemnts based on an input file that is parsed (XML-Data model, create script, xhtml form, php ...) or direct via a database connection (Oracle, MySQL, SQL Server, ...).
For further details visit our website with JavaDoc, development statistics and various tutorials for the use of the plug-in as well as some hints for developers.
